name: Rin Kagamine: Dreamy Dress Up Theatre
name_original: Rin Kagamine: Dreamy Dress Up Theatre
description:
Welcome to the Dreamy Dress Up Theatre!

Here you will compete agaisnt other people trying to take the spot as the #1 Rin Kagamine! 

A total of 7 endings are unlockable with 5 achievements! That's more than I can count!
